reviewText: From the olden days before actual porn comes a duo of films narrated by a woman who is constantly purring her narration out badly at times. Some of it sounding like bad Harlequin romance novel stuff. Otherwise you are watching basically 60's porn, well, basically softcore, not extreme graphic hardcore like later. I have to admit that some of the women are gorgeous, and certainly the music and the fashions date this pretty heavily, plus the  black and white photography. Some of this looks like someone's home movie at times too. Fascinating for me, but to others, beware.

this movie was not well done, a girl talked throughout the movie and the acting was just terrible. The cover didn't seem to match the movie contents. The girls played a bit but nothing really heated. Overall, it was very corny and really not worth the price of the movie.

Would not recommend to anyone unless they just like to watch old movies.
